verses.text: \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H1732"\w* king rejoices \w in|strong="H1732"\w* \w Your|strong="H1732"\w* strength. How greatly \w he|strong="H1732"\w* exults \w in|strong="H1732"\w* \w Your|strong="H1732"\w* salvation!

\w You|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* granted \w his|strong="H3068"\w* heart’s desire \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* not withheld \w the|strong="H3068"\w* request \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* lips. Selah

\w For|strong="H5414"\w* \w You|strong="H5414"\w* welcomed \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w with|strong="H3820"\w* rich blessings; \w You|strong="H5414"\w* \w placed|strong="H5414"\w* \w on|strong="H5414"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* head \w a|strong="H3068"\w* crown \w of|strong="H3820"\w* pure gold.

\w He|strong="H3588"\w* asked \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* life, \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w* granted \w it|strong="H3588"\w*— length \w of|strong="H7218"\w* days, forever \w and|strong="H7218"\w* ever.

Great \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* glory \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w Your|strong="H5414"\w* salvation; \w You|strong="H5414"\w* \w bestow|strong="H5414"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* splendor \w and|strong="H3117"\w* majesty.

\w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w You|strong="H5921"\w* grant \w him|strong="H5921"\w* blessings forever; \w You|strong="H5921"\w* cheer \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w joy|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w Your|strong="H5921"\w* \w presence|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H6440"\w* trusts \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*; \w through|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* loving devotion \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Most|strong="H1293"\w* High, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1293"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H6440"\w* shaken.

\w Your|strong="H3068"\w* hand \w will|strong="H3068"\w* apprehend \w all|strong="H3068"\w* \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* enemies; \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* \w right|strong="H3068"\w* hand \w will|strong="H3068"\w* seize \w those|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* hate \w You|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* \w place|strong="H3027"\w* \w them|strong="H3027"\w* \w in|strong="H4672"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* fiery furnace \w at|strong="H4672"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* time \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w Your|strong="H3605"\w* appearing. \w In|strong="H4672"\w* \w His|strong="H3605"\w* wrath \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* engulf \w them|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* fire \w will|strong="H3027"\w* consume \w them|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w You|strong="H6440"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* wipe \w their|strong="H3068"\w* descendants \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* earth, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* offspring \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* sons \w of|strong="H3068"\w* men.
Though they intend \w You|strong="H2233"\w* harm, \w the|strong="H1121"\w* schemes they devise \w will|strong="H1121"\w* \w not|strong="H1121"\w* prevail.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H7451"\w* \w put|strong="H5186"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H3201"\w* flight \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w Your|strong="H5921"\w* \w bow|strong="H5186"\w* \w is|strong="H7451"\w* trained \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w Be|strong="H6440"\w* exalted, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w Your|strong="H5921"\w* strength; \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3588"\w* sing \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w praise|strong="H3588"\w* \w Your|strong="H5921"\w* \w power|strong="H3559"\w*.
